channel.title: Histograms on R & Analiz
channel.description: Recent content in Histograms on R & Analiz

item.title: Histograms
item.description: Import dataset (code below only works if file is in working directory) med <- read.csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fabricandofitfaber/mayhem/master/MedicalData.csv') Create Grouped Boxplot boxplot(med$BMI~med$Diabetic,main='Distribution of BMI',xlab='Diabetic Status',ylab='BMI',names=c('No','Yes')) Create subsets of BMI values based on diabetic status BMI_no <- med$BMI[med$Diabetic==0] BMI_yes <- med$BMI[med$Diabetic==1] Create grouped histogram hist(BMI_no,main='Distribution of BMI',xlab='BMI',right=F,xlim=c(15,60),col='#0000FF75') hist(BMI_yes,right=F,add=T,col='#B2222275')
